title: Maine
prompt: A weathered wooden porch overlooking a rural Maine road at golden hour, with an elderly person's hands resting on the railing in soft focus—worn wedding band visible—looking toward distant pine forests under overcast sky. Wide-angle documentary composition capturing the solitude and vastness of the landscape, with faded house details and overgrown gardens suggesting quiet resilience. Muted greens, grays, and warm amber light; the texture of age and endurance without sentimentality.
